title: Job Posting: Refinement and digitizing of hand painted letterforms
content:
We have a project with an existing hand-painted logotype.

This is a moderately decortive bodoni-esque swash two word logotype.

We need to refine the letterforms and create a final digitized version.  
You would be working from a high-resolution scan of the logotype.

This is not a pure digitization job, but more a refinement and correction of the painted letter forms.

Please contact me directly if you are interested in the project.

**Kyle Hildebrant**  
 [kyle@brandsbyovo.com](mailto:kyle@brandsbyovo.com)

**Please email examples of (or links to) similar work, or work that would give us faith in your capabilities.**

This would be a ’Work for Hire’ situation. You would be given proper credit, and would be granted limited rights to use the work for your own personal/promotional use.

Thanks guys!

_(Please, serious professional inquiries only)_

 [‹ help with translating a few terms, please](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030741/http:/typophile.com/node/14727 "Go to previous forum topic") [Blatant Plagiarism / Infringment ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030741/http:/typophile.com/node/13977 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Hildebrant

comments.content: For all those who have contacted (and still wish to contact), we are logging your information, and will contact you with further details. The project is still in its infancy, so bear with us. Thanks.
